author: ddewolf
msg: rolling back admin portlets which caused conflicts. craig and i agreed to work on this in the branch we just created;  This commit completes the work on auto-publishing and adding portlets to pages

author: rgardler
msg: The start of an example that processes a Forrest1 seed site.
Almost none of this is working right now, but the structure
is there. The first task is to complete the conversion of the
XDoc source files to the XHTML2 subset used in Forrest2.
This initial contribution provides an input plugin for this
but lots of work on the stylesheet is still needed.
